name: Enhanced Execute Tool
description: Add options to execute_tool for field projection, filtering, limiting, and return modes to reduce context pollution

criteria.criterion: execute_tool accepts an optional 'options' parameter with select_fields, limit, filter, return_mode
select_fields option returns only specified fields from results (supports dot notation for nested fields)
limit option restricts array results to specified count server-side
return_mode 'summary' returns {count, sample: [...3 items]} instead of full data
return_mode 'file' writes results to temp file and returns {path, count, size}
filter option applies server-side filtering with operators: =, !=, >, <, CONTAINS, STARTS_WITH, IS_NULL, IS_NOT_NULL
All existing execute_tool calls continue to work without options (backward compatible)
